headline: MSCI Earnings Beat Highlights Recurring Fees And ESG Growth Questions
summary: MSCI (NYSE:MSCI) reported earnings that exceeded market expectations. The company raised its outlook, citing resilience in recurring fee streams. Management highlighted ongoing growth in index and ESG products despite regulatory scrutiny in the US. MSCI, best known for its global equity indexes and risk analytics, sits at the center of how many institutions build and monitor portfolios. Its ESG ratings and climate tools are also widely used, even as these products face closer attention from...
